name: ASAuthorizationAppleIDButton.ButtonType
desc: A type for the authorization button.

items.name: case `continue`
items.desc: A button type that continues the Sign in with Apple authorization process.

items.name: static var `default`: ASAuthorizationAppleIDButton.ButtonType
items.desc: A default button type for the Sign in with Apple authorization process.

items.name: case signUp
items.desc: A button type that allows the user to sign up for Sign in with Apple.

items.name: case signIn
items.desc: A button type that performs authorization using Sign in with Apple.
